name: Iron Man
description: Tony Stark's iconic armored superhero suit, equipped with repulsor rays and advanced technology.

name: Captain America
description: Steve Rogers' patriotic alter ego, wielding his shield to defend justice and freedom.

name: Thor
description: The God of Thunder, armed with Mjolnir, the enchanted hammer that grants him incredible power.

name: Hulk
description: Bruce Banner's alter ego, a green behemoth with immense strength and near-indestructibility.

name: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff, a highly skilled spy and martial artist, using her expertise to take down adversaries.

name: Spider-Man
description: Peter Parker's web-slinging alter ego, with enhanced agility and the ability to stick to walls.

name: Darth Vader
description: The iconic Sith Lord with a menacing black suit, using the Force and a red lightsaber.

name: Luke Skywalker
description: The legendary Jedi Knight, wielding a blue lightsaber and fighting for peace and justice.

name: Princess Leia
description: A leader in the Rebel Alliance, armed with intelligence and determination in the fight against the Empire.

name: Hawkeye
description: Clint Barton, an expert archer and marksman, making precision shots with his bow and arrows.

name: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, the king of Wakanda, with enhanced strength, agility, and the advanced Black Panther suit.

name: Scarlet Witch
description: Wanda Maximoff, possessing reality-warping abilities and unleashing powerful chaos magic.

name: Vision
description: An android with superhuman abilities, including flight, density manipulation, and energy beams.

name: Optimus Prime
description: The noble and powerful leader of the Autobots, with the ability to transform into a semi-truck and wield a laser rifle.

name: Bumblebee
description: A brave and loyal Autobot scout, transforming into a compact yellow Chevrolet Camaro and equipped with various gadgets.

name: Megatron
description: The ruthless and powerful leader of the Decepticons, transforming into a Cybertronian tank and wielding a fusion cannon.

name: Starscream
description: A cunning and ambitious Decepticon air commander, transforming into a fighter jet and armed with missile launchers.

name: Soundwave
description: A loyal Decepticon communications officer, transforming into a cassette player and deploying mini cassette bots for reconnaissance.

name: Optimus Primal
description: The noble leader of the Maximals, transforming into a massive gorilla and wielding a pair of swords.

name: Megatron (Beast Wars)
description: The ruthless and cunning leader of the Predacons, transforming into a Tyrannosaurus Rex and armed with a fusion blaster.
